title: Italian Pizza Margherita
description: Classic Neapolitan pizza made with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, salt, and extra-virgin olive oil.

title: USA Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and pickles, served in a toasted bun.

title: Spanish Seafood Paella
description: A traditional Spanish rice dish made with saffron-infused rice, seafood like shrimp and mussels, chicken, and vegetables.

title: French Coq au Vin
description: A classic French dish of chicken braised with wine (traditionally Burgundy), lardons, mushrooms, and optionally garlic.

title: Mexican Street Tacos al Pastor
description: Flavorful spit-grilled pork, marinated in a blend of dried chilies, spices, and pineapple, served on small corn tortillas.

title: British Fish and Chips
description: Crispy battered cod or haddock, served with a generous portion of thick-cut fried potatoes (chips).

title: Hungarian Goulash
description: A hearty stew of meat (typically beef) and vegetables, seasoned with paprika and other spices. Often served with noodles or bread.

title: Austrian Wiener Schnitzel
description: A large, thin, breaded and pan-fried veal cutlet. Traditionally served with a slice of lemon and potato salad.

title: Peruvian Ceviche
description: Fresh raw fish cured in citrus juices, such as lemon or lime, and spiced with ají, chili peppers, onions, and cilantro.

title: Brazilian Feijoada Completa
description: A rich black bean stew with various cuts of pork and beef, typically served with rice, collard greens, farofa, and orange slices.

title: Greek Moussaka
description: An eggplant and/or potato-based dish, often including ground meat, layered with a creamy Béchamel sauce and baked.

title: Canadian Poutine
description: A classic Canadian comfort food made with french fries and cheese curds topped with a brown gravy.

title: Argentine Asado (Mixed Grill)
description: A traditional South American barbecue featuring a variety of grilled meats, including beef, pork, chicken, and sausages like chorizo.

title: Japanese Sushi Assortment
description: A selection of vinegared rice (sushi) combined with various ingredients such as seafood (tuna, salmon), vegetables, and nori.

title: Thai Pad Thai Noodles
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp or chicken, tofu, peanuts, scrambled egg, and bean sprouts, in a tangy tamarind sauce.

title: Indian Chicken Biryani
description: A fragrant and flavorful mixed rice dish made with long-grain rice, spices, meat (chicken, mutton, or fish), and vegetables.

title: German Sauerbraten
description: A traditional German pot roast, typically beef (but other meats can be used) marinated for days in a wine or vinegar mixture.
